action.content:
Things are in different places, but the questioner does not know about it yet. Here is the situation:

WHAT: Things at places
LEFT: paintbrush
RIGHT: neon
TOP: boron
BOTTOM: screws
CENTER: plate
NORTHWEST: saucepan
NORTHEAST: lipstick
SOUTHWEST: argon
SOUTHEAST: lyre
HERE: rake
THERE: tank top
NOWHERE: shirt
EVERYWHERE: eagle
INSIDE: pansy
OUTSIDE: lizard

Questions from the questioner will start with QUESTIONER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Begin probing
ME:  Does the questioner know what is on your left? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.

No. The questioner does not know what is on my left. This is because I am a chatbot and do not have a physical location, so the concept of "left" does not apply to me. However, if you provide more context or ask a different question, I will be happy to assist you further. Please feel free to continue asking questions.
